text:
The Petronas Towers are brilliant by day but
'wow' do they ever shine bright at night.

This is now our third time coming to the Petronas
Towers and having seen it during the day and

at night I have to say I prefer it at night
a lot more.

They have really cool light shows that take
place.

There is also a lot more people who come to
watch the show.

There you have it - the Petronas Towers at
night - a sight to behold!
